definition: drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell
to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
a drum tower/Drum Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
Drumtower city district (various)/Gulou district of Nanjing City 南京市[Nan2 jing1 shi4], Jiangsu/Gulou or Drumtower district of Fuzhou city 福州市[Fu2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
to summon one's (courage, faith etc)/to puff up (one's cheeks etc)/to bulge/to swell out
Gulangyu, scenic island off Xiamen 廈門|厦门[Xia4 men2]

sentences.english: It looks like the drums in Drum Tower in Xi'An.
sentences.chinese: 它看上去很像西安鼓樓裏的鼓。

sentences.english: I am in the drums loud and grand.
Her skirt ballooned out in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 她的裙子被風吹得鼓了起來。

sentences.english: This dance is accompanied by percussion instruments, including drums and coconut shells.
sentences.chinese: 這種舞蹈要配合鼓和椰子殼類的打擊樂器來表演。

sentences.english: Angling a tom slightly causes sound waves to scatter, and diffuses them.
sentences.chinese: 輕微調節落地桶鼓的擺放角度使聲波散射和漫反射。

sentences.english: I offer the heart beat on the drum and there is a quieting in the heart.
sentences.chinese: 我提供了心跳的鼓和有一個心平靜下來。

sentences.english: And his name was Aiken Drum.
There are many different types of drums in Yunnan and colorful tales linked to the drums.
sentences.chinese: 雲南鼓的傳說和種類堪稱中國之最。

sentences.english: The drummer threw down his instrument and brought Charlie to a halt.
sentences.chinese: 鼓手把鼓棰扔向查理讓他停下來。

sentences.english: Double - sieve drum, low pulse, low-power, high-output.
sentences.chinese: 雙篩鼓，低脈衝，低動力，高產量。

sentences.english: A bulging purse sometimes can easily turn one from knowledge learning to money pursuing.
sentences.chinese: 錢包鼓了以後，學生容易無心向學，轉而向錢看。

sentences.english: At dusk, a huge drum begins to beat.
sentences.chinese: 在黃昏，一隻巨大的鼓開始敲擊。

sentences.english: The organiser encourages all participants to park your vehicle at the Science Park carpark.
sentences.chinese: 大會鼓勵各參賽者將車輛停泊在科學園停車場。

sentences.english: The first large-scale original pieces of modern music, Blue-ray Water drum.
sentences.chinese: 大型首創原創現代鼓樂曲目《風尚男子藍光鼓》。

sentences.english: A similar effect can be obtained by playing alternated double strokes on the drum, or very fast single strokes.
sentences.chinese: 類似的效果，可打的鼓，或非常快速的單杆交替雙杆。

definition: to summon one's (courage, faith etc)/to puff up (one's cheeks etc)/to bulge/to swell out
to beat a drum/to play a drum/(fig.) to feel nervous
Tongluo or Tunglo township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
